name: CreateShape

arguments.name: refShape
arguments.desc: Handle to reference shape or path to vox file

examples: local handle = CreateShape(FindBody("shape", true), t, FindShape("shape", true))
description: Create new, empty shape on existing body using the palette of a reference shape.
The reference shape can be any existing shape in the scene or an external vox file.
The size of the new shape will be 1x1x1.
